file_content.text: These chemicals--the Empire's using them to kill every Evocii on Nar Shaddaa. Probably a favor to the Hutts....
This is a crime against the galaxy. I won't allow it to continue!
They must be stopped!
The Republic won't stand for this injustice! The Empire must pay!
They must be stopped!
Whoever's behind this, I'll make 'em pay!
They must be stopped!
We've got to act fast. No telling how many Evocii they've killed already.
I'm completely serious. The Empire's doing the unthinkable.
We've got to stop this atrocity, not commit our own.
Just because you're human doesn't mean you dodge this. The Empire's crimes hurt everyone.
Looks like these chemicals are used at some kind of extermination factory run by a Commander Vergost.
I need you to storm that factory and shut it down! Now!
I'll strike them immediately. The Empire won't have time to react.
I'm on my way.
I've been itching for a good fight.
Finally, a worthy challenge.
Please--Evocii are being murdered as we speak. You've got to assault the Empire's slaughterhouse now!
Since you put it that way....
Fine.
Thank you. You'll have thanks from the entire Evocii community.
Don't be long. Those Evocii depend on you.
Get inside the extermination factory, then find some way to shut it down.
Go ahead. Abandon those Evocii to the Empire's cruelty. I can't stop you.
I've got access. Excellent! I'll have this security down in no time.
Take a minute to rest. Must've been tough fighting through their defenses.
Just another second and--there! I'm in.
Here we are. Everything about the toxins, what the Empire's doing with them and....
You're joking?
I'll murder everyone involved.
I'll murder everyone involved.
Good thing I'm a human.
I don't know. Seems dangerous.
Give me time to think it over.
Never. [Refuse quest.]
